title: Here, there & back again
creator_credit: Wayne Hornsby, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Wayne Hornsby was in Thailand when he was diagnosed with HIV. He reflects on his journey, nearly dying and his return to Australia, where his work in helping HIV positive people eventually leads him back to Thailand.
creator_credit_for_label: Wayne Hornsby, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
